title: HTML option[lang] element
description: This test ensures that `option` elements with a `lang` attribute are announced correctly.
sr_instructions: If the screen reader attempts to read the text in as english or not at all, this test fails regardless of what the other instructions indicate. The screen reader must announce the text of the target element in the correct language.

firefox.notes: Had to install the Simplified Chinese language in the Windows 10 Language Settings for this to work. If the language is not installed, nothing will be announced.

output.output: (attempts to speak characters as english ideographs)

safari.notes: Had the Chinese language installed in VO settings.
